content.question: Matrix <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> is a <math alttext="3 by 4"><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></math> matrix, and matrix <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> is a <math alttext="4 by 2"><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math> matrix. Which of the following is defined?

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
